response.message: I'll add a line to update the value 'Bob' to 'James' in the 'Name' column of the dataframe `df`.

cell_update.code:
import pandas as pd

data = {
    'Name': ['Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie'],
    'Age': [25, 30, 35],
    'City': ['New York', 'Los Angeles', 'Chicago']
}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

df.loc[df['Name'] == 'Bob', 'Name'] = 'James'
df

response.message: I've updated the dataframe so 'Bob' in the 'Name' column is now changed to 'James'.
